XIV.4.D.14.d
.
Determining the Need for an Examination in IU Cases
To determine the need for an examination in an IU case, the rating activity shall review the information submitted by the Veteran and/or the Veteran's employer.Â  If
VA Form 21-4140
indicates the Veteran reported the earnings and VA failed to take action, it is an administrative error.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
